title: Women in Beijing
overview: A realistic depiction about an independent woman in Beijing and her experiences in love and life.After graduating from college, Chen Ke Yi has always dreamed of making it in the big city. She has already made plans with boyfriend Yang Da He but family issues cause the two to breakup. Left to fend for herself alone in Beijing, Chen Ke Yi feels the vulnerability of having no one to depend on. She decides to change her name to Chen Ke in hopes that it'll help her become stronger. One step at a time, Chen Ke evolves and matures through her multiple career changes in her journey through life.
